tool.name: generate_sliding_windows

param.name: input
param.label: input fasta file
param.help: select fasta file for which you wish to generate a multi-fasta file in a sliding window fashion

param.name: window
param.label: window size
param.help: Specifiy the size of the windows that should be generated

param.name: step
param.label: step size
param.help: Specify the distance with which windows should be spaced apart.

tool.help:
Generate fixed size sliding windows in fasta format from multi-fasta sequence.
optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit --input INPUT supply an input multi-fasta file. --output OUTPUT supply an output multi-fasta file. If not specified use stdout. --window WINDOW Set the size of the generated windows --step STEP Set distance between the windows
